I don't know how you guys do it - but I intend to enjoy the tv series downloads while they last!  I watched this BB episode via live stream and couldn't believe how quickly you had this available just after the episode finished.  I'm seeding as I write and thank you eztv team.

One other thing - to those that "comment" asking for .avi type files....stop asking.  Go to Walmart or Sams and buy a VIZIO (or research and find a TV that has A/V & HDMI conx). Currently the 32" can be gotten for $275 - smaller screen even cheaper.  It has all kinds of A/V input plugs and if you have the ability to download these torrents and watch them on your computer - chances are that you can plug into, and watch on the VIZIO.

You want to burn a DVD - download ConvertXtoDVD and use it to make a DVD from eztv's files.
Cheers.

@captmorgan19 : YES THANK YOU! i have said the same thing in every torrent comment section i see where some dumb ass asks for a avi. file version.(although let them figure it out for themselves... or they have to pay).... either they take the time to learn or they can be lazy and be forced to pay due to ignorance(they aren't asking help... they are bitching).... netflix has to be in business for a reason....... you guys are getting free shit... stop bitching over such little things like a request for avi.....which by the way... avi. files are not used any more b/c people have external hard drives that are in the multi terabit range. and faster d/l speeds.MP4s are the ones to use.Everything about them are better. Unless your computer is from the 90s in which case, i don't even know where to begin. The majority of people on TPB(and torrent sites in general) and consider themselves to be the least bit intelligent when it comes to computers and/or torrents do not like avi. files. they consider them to be outdated, aggravating, and they are broken files. Who the hell wants to load a file into a media player, and then have to have it repair itself every time. it is like loading the same file twice. i don't know about everyone else... but that slow is too slow for me. and on this comment forum me and the captain agree and are making it known.
